headline: Ads for Booking.com and three hotel chains banned over misleading prices
summary: The ASA ruled that Booking.com, Accor, Travelodge and Hilton all misled consumers over the number of rooms available at the cheapest prices.

raw.headline: Ads for Booking.com and three hotel chains banned over misleading prices

headline: Is There an Opportunity in Booking Holdings After Recent 5% Share Price Drop?
summary: Wondering if Booking Holdings’ stock price represents real value right now? Let’s break down whether there is opportunity or risk hiding beneath the surface. After surging more than 149% over three years and 130% in five, Booking Holdings has recently cooled off with a 5.3% drop over the past week and a 5.7% dip over the last month. Recent headlines have focused on evolving travel trends and the company’s expansion into new markets, fueling both curiosity and concern. Industry analysts have...

headline: A Fresh Look at Booking Holdings (BKNG) Valuation Following Momentum Shift
summary: Booking Holdings (BKNG) shares have been trading lower over the past month, with returns lagging broader market performance. Investors may be weighing the company’s longer-term growth prospects in comparison to recent pressure on the stock price. See our latest analysis for Booking Holdings. Even with recent share price pressure, Booking Holdings has delivered a remarkable 149% total shareholder return over the past three years and 131% in five, though momentum has clearly faded in the past...
